# moviePlayer

**Instance Property**

The movie player controller object used to present the movie.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var moviePlayer: MPMoviePlayerController! { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlayerController] object in this property is created automatically by the receiver and cannot be changed. However, you can use the object to manage the presentation and configuration of the movie playback.

## New methods

- **init(contentURL:)**: Returns a movie player view controller initialized with the specified movie.
